name: ./iamsudip
body:
### Personal Information
**Name:** Sudip Maji

**IRC nick:** iamsudip

**email:** iamsudip@programmer.net

### About Me
I am software developer who is in love with Python. Being a lazy person I try to automate everything which makes life easy using Python. When I am not coding, I can be found playing cricket or playing Age of empires.  

### Experience
**Software Developer Intern at [HackerEarth](https://www.hackerearth.com/), January 2015 - Present**

* Buliding **[HackerEarth Leaderboard API](https://www.hackerearth.com/docs/api/challenges/)** for HackerEarth Coding challenges and previously created **[HackerEarth Recruiters API](https://www.hackerearth.com/docs/api/recruiter/)** using Python/Django, Django-tastypie

* Built a documentation infrastructure for HackerEarth

* Integrated Google-nocaptcha with HackerEarth login

* Worked with team on building new version of HackerEarth Interview panel

**Intern at [Profoundis Labs](http://www.profoundis.com), June 2014**

* Built a centralized logging system for distributed machines using Python, zero-MQ, Sqlite etc.

* Wrote crawlers for various web services

### Projects
**[Conversed](http://conversedme-iamsudip.rhcloud.com/)**: Find the person behind an email address.

**[pysub-dl](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pysub-dl/)**: Terminal tool to download movie subtitles

**[vid2mp3](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/vid2mp3/)**: Terminal tool to download Youtube videos as mp3.

**[pymbook](https://readthedocs.org/projects/pymbook/)**: Python book by Kushal Das. (Upstream Contribution)

**[Hasgeek-hasjob](https://hasjob.co/)**: Hasgeek Job board. (Upstream Contribution)

**[Hasgeek-baseframe](https://github.com/hasgeek/baseframe)**: Baseframe for HasGeek projects. (Upstream Contribution)

### Education
**Dr. B. C. Roy Engineering College, Durgapur**
* B.Tech in Computer Science and Technology, June 2015 (Expected)

**Durgapur A. V. B. High School (H. S.), Durgapur**
* Higher Secondary, W. B. C. H. S. E, 2009 - 2011

**Durgapur A. V. B. High School, Durgapur**
* Secondary, W. B. B. S. E, 2005 - 2011

### References
**Kushal Das**, CPython core developer at PSF, kushaldas@gmail.com

**Ratnadeep Debnath**, Software Engineer at ibibo Web Pvt. Ltd., rtnpro@gmail.com
